messages.content: This information pertains to the Program Structure for Second Year Artificial Intelligence and Data Science Engineering.
What are the courses offered in Semester III?

In Semester III, the following courses are offered: Engineering Mathematics III, Discrete Structures and Graph Theory, Data Structure, Digital Logic & Computer Architecture, Computer Networks and Operating Systems.
Can you provide details about the teaching scheme for the course ADC301?
ADC301, Engineering Mathematics III, has a teaching scheme of 4 theory contact hours and 1 tutorial contact hour.
How are the courses evaluated in Semester III?
The examination scheme includes internal assessment and end semester exams, with specific marks allocated for theory, term work, and practicals for each course.
Are there any labs in Semester III?
Yes, there are labs for Data Structure, Digital Logic & Computer Architecture, and Computer Networks and Operating Systems.
What is the total credit assigned for Semester III?
The total credit assigned for Semester III is 23.
